metadata.Plot: Jay, a well established musician and singer is the new name on the charts. He is one of the very few ethnic artist that is becoming prominent in recent times which brings about concerns and jealousy amongst his peers in the industry. After a show, his team greets him and congratulates him on his success, however they suspected something and leaves the room. Meanwhile, an interview was to take place with him. The interview was cut short by him inviting the reporter back to his residence the following day. It is here when things start to change. The film ends revealing the climax of the story as to why the industry is full of deception.
metadata.Actors: James Ellis, Ashish Chaudhary, Rachit Bhatia
